attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"CSV export writes VNCProxyPassword and RDGatewayPassword in plaintext, bypassing SaveFilter that correctly guards the main Password field","priority":"P1-security","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Csv/CsvConnectionsSerializerMremotengFormat.cs"],"approach":"Guard VNCProxyPassword and RDGatewayPassword (and their Inheritance variants at lines ~188, 196, 291, 299) behind _saveFilter.SavePassword, matching the pattern already used for the main Password field; existing security warning dialog in FrmExport.cs already covers the user-facing flow"}
